title: SAV des Emissions
resume: Le Service après-vente des émissions or SAV des émissions is a French short comedy television series hosted by the comic duo Omar and Fred since 2005 on Canal+. The show is a segment of Le Grand Journal, a news show hosted by Michel Denisot. The series is rebroadcast, in the morning, on Virgin Radio.
